replies.author: TE爷
replies.txt_content:
标题: 我是谁？who am i,can you guess?
i have a sister she is eleve years old and she very nice she is happy every day
i often tell she ''you have a good time?'' ''oh,i think me very happy''.
i think my sister is a good stdent so she likes English very much she often says ''i am NO.1 in our school''
i am stdent,too my mother is a worker my father is ofice worker they often say ''you have to work''
so i love my family i love minecraft too!

Hi.
You are not good at English.
First,
every letter which on the beginning must be capital.
Then,
"you have a good time?"is a wrong sentence.
You must say"Do you have a good time?"
